template.FxtDocumentDescription: Export the lexicon as files in a folder according to the Lexicon Interchange FormaT (LIFT) version 0.13. See http://code.google.com/p/lift-standard for more information about LIFT. It places in a folder a .lift file and the other files and folders needed to make a complete "LIFT export". Exports only records showing in the current filter. Outputs all fields for each record.
